00142 class MainWindow: public QMainWindow, private Ui::MainWindow
00143 {
00144         Q_OBJECT
00145 
00150         class QStringFromBoostVariant: public boost::static_visitor<QString>
00151         {
00152                 const MainWindow * mParent;
00153         public:
00154                 QStringFromBoostVariant(const MainWindow * p): mParent(p) {}
00155                 QString operator()(const int& i) const          { return QString::number(i); }
00156                 QString operator()(const std::string& s) const  { return QString(tr(s.c_str())); }
00157                 QString operator()(const double& d) const       { return mParent->qstringFromDouble(d); }
00158                 QString operator()(const complex& c) const { return mParent->qstringFromComplex(c); }
00159         };

00359 class LangAction: public QAction
00360 {
00361         Q_OBJECT
00362 public:
00368         LangAction(QObject * parent, const QString& fn):
00369                 QAction(parent), langFilename(fn)
00370         {
00371                 setText(tr(fn.toAscii().data()));
00372                 connect(this, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(triggeredSlot()));
00373         }
00374 public slots:
00377         void triggeredSlot() { emit triggered(langFilename); }
00378 signals:
00381         void triggered(const QString&);
00382 private:
00383         const QString   langFilename; 
00384 };
